overview: This nine minute video loop emerged from research into the writings and experiences of iconic Berlin based collective Kommune 1, often described as Germanyâ€™s first politically motivated commune. Here the experiences of some of the leading figures of the movement are pushed into temporal ambiguity as the narrative around the desire and drive for transformation is transported into an ambiguous time and space. Documentary material merges with material from science fiction narratives in a two-part loop.
title: It Did Happen Soon
